topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547a4f186368721a69b70200#post_547a4f186368721a69b70200
I guess so.

EVA was the first anime super robot show to be more psychological.

Basically what I'm saying about that is that besides the psychological stuff, The mental problems and 2deep4u shit. EVA is pretty much an Anime version of Super robot mangas.

I do guess the comparison is fairly accurate
